column5: Got out with the good folks at Cag for their spring carp-in. Tough bite today with the colder water temps. Figure the season is 2-3 weeks behind. Even so, a few fish were landed. Even the peanut and I managed one for the team.   Despite the poor bite, I was in great company. In all a thoroughly enjoyable day.
Awesome Bruce    She's a nice one for sure
Nice one! I'm hoping to find some carp spots in my area this year. thanks for the update!
Damn, I know that spot Bruce, had I known I'd have dropped by for a chat.
Nice catch, I haven't caught a carp since last spring...got to get out and do it again!   Thanks for the report   MTBF
Guess it's time to dust of the carp gear!  Thanks for that post Bruce and congratz on an early one.  See ya out there one of these times!
It was good meeting ya Bruce  Also good seeing the old faces again...  I just went to Socialize
Almost time !!!  Thanks for igniting the flame again.  carper
